lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace and Newcastle United traded players on Friday, with winger Andros Townesend moving to London for £13 million (13.00 million pounds) and striker Dwight Gayle joining the recently relegated club for £10 million (10.00 million pounds).

headline.print_headline: Palace Sign Townsend and Sell Gayle to Newcastle
headline.main: Palace Sign Townsend and Sell Gayle to Newcastle
